mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qa (product_id, user_id, title, content, reply, created, updated) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{reply}, #{created}, #{updated})
mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.product_id, q.user_id, q.title, q.content, q.reply, q.created, q.updated, p.name AS product_name, u.username AS user_name FROM qa q JOIN products p ON q.product_id = p.id JOIN users u ON q.user_id = u.id
